entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
